Projects

R packages

The R packages can be installed using the devtools package, for example devtools::install_github("nathanesau", "m4fe").

  • makehams Code for SOA Exam MLC, “Models for Life Contingencies” with focus on survival models such as Makeham’s Law.
  • MSM Code for SOA Exam MLC, “Models for Life Contingencies” with focus on multiple state models.
  • m4fe Code for SOA Exam MFE, “Models for Financial Economics”. On CRAN.
  • lmodels Code for SOA Exam C, “Construction and Evaluation of Actuarial Models”.
  • StocVal Part of research project from Summer 2015. Risk-neutral valuation of embedded options in pension plans. Reproducing results from SOA Research Study.
  • stocins Stochastic interest rate models for life insurance (for Acma 490 course in Spring 2017).

Case Competitions

  • Asna2016 Actuarial Students National Association 2016 Competition related to analyzing the cost effectiveness of automobile safety features.
  • MunichReCup2016 Munich Re Cup 2016 Competition related to analyzing insurer strategies to deal with high prescription drug costs.
  • ukencompetition Simon Fraser University Statistics Department 2015 Competition related to using data science methods to predict revenue earned from in-app purchases in a mobile app game. The code is provided, but I do not have permission to release the competition dataset.

nathanesau.github.io is maintained by nathanesau.
